DOC.brief_title: Voriconazole ( Vfend ) Special Investigation ( Regulatory Post Marketing Commitment Plan )
DOC.criteria: Male Female patient prescribed voriconazole ( VFEND ) deep mycosis Scedosporisis . Subject prescribed voriconazole ( VFEND ) deep mycosis Aspergillus , Candidasis , Cryptococcal infection involve Scedosporisis .
